session_summary: Audrey informed Andrew about her dogs' behavior issues, her appointment with an animal behaviorist, and the positive tips she received for handling the problems. The conversation then shifted to planning a nature hike with their furry friends on Saturday, exploring a trail by a lake with scenic views. They expressed excitement and gratitude for the upcoming adventure, sharing photos of potential locations and expressing eagerness to capture memories with their dogs. Andrew shared a photo of his happy dog from a previous hike, and they both looked forward to creating new joyful memories together. They planned to meet for the hike and said their goodbyes as they got ready to head out.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Hey Andrew, I wanted to let you know about something going on with my dogs. I noticed they weren't acting normally, so I made an appointment with an animal behaviorist last Wed. It's been a bit hectic but I'm hopeful it'll help me better understand them.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Oh no! Sorry to hear that your dogs haven't been themselves. Are they doing ok? How did the appointment with the animal behaviorist go? Did you receive any helpful advice or insights?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: The appointment went okay. It was hectic at first, but the behaviorist checked them out and asked some questions. I got some tips to try and help with their problems now.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: So what tips did you get? What will you be doing to help with the problems?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: The behaviorist gave me tips on how to handle it and suggested some changes in their routine. I'm using positive reinforcement techniques and it's still a work in progress, but I'm hopeful it'll help.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: I'm glad your pups are still good with positive reinforcement! How are they doing with the new approach tho?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: So far they seem to be responding well to it! It won't be fixed immediately but I'm seeing some progress. Here's hoping it keeps going.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: That's good to hear! Keep up the good work!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! Your words of encouragement really mean a lot. It's tough, but I'm devoted to keeping them healthy and happy - they mean everything to me.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: You're doing a great job! They're lucky to have you.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two dogs running in a field with a ball in their mouth
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! They're really special to me and I want the best for them. Here's a pic of them having a blast last summer, so happy! I'm looking forward the day they are back to normal.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Aww, they're having such a blast! What kind are they? I'm wishing you and your pups the best.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Thanks! They're all mutts, but Pepper and Panda are Lab mixes, and Precious and Pixie are Chihuahua mixes. I really need that. I can't wait the day they're all back to normal.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a man hiking up a mountain with a backpack
conversation_turns.text: Sending prayers and wishes. Here's a pic I took at a national park I went a while ago.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that looks gorgeous! We hope to join you and the furry friends soon!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a man walking a dog on a leash
conversation_turns.text: Yeah I really hope your pups can get better and join us soon!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that trail looks nice! Looks like its dog friendly?

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Yup! It's close by and it's dog-friendly too, with killer views. Wanna plan a hike soon?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Hmmm sure! Let's pick a date and go hike. It should be good!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Yay! Does Saturday sound good? We can grab some snacks and have a blast exploring. Because on Sunday I am going on a picnic date with my girlfriend.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Saturday works for me! I'm going to bring some snack. Super excited!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Can't wait for our nature day with the fur babies! We're gonna have a good time!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a dog laying on the ground with a view of the ocean
conversation_turns.text: Going hiking and seeing nature will be awesome. They'll be so happy!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: I bet! Where do you guys plan to explore?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Let's check out the trail first. It's a peaceful spot to bring the fur babies for the day.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great! There's a lake near the trail too! It's gonna be awesome!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a lake with a boat in it and a forest in the background
conversation_turns.text: Oh nice! Can't wait to explore it and hang out with our furry friends. Should be a peaceful day! Here's a photo of the lake I found online.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that looks awesome! Do you think the dogs will like it? Which trail do you have in mind?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Let's try that trail by the lake with great views, perfect for us and the pups. Should be fun!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great! They will love it by the lake. Can't wait!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a dog chasing a dog in a park
conversation_turns.text: Gonna be great - nature, furry pals - what more could we want? I'm so lucky to have a friend like you who loves exploring and being outside with our dogs.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a dog eating out of a bowl on the ground
conversation_turns.text: Same! I'm lucky to have a friend like you for these outdoor trips. It's awesome to be out in nature with our furry friends.

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yup! It's hard to find someone that has similar thoughts.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a forest with yellow trees and a blue sky
conversation_turns.text: Exactly! Oh btw, here's another photo of a trail near the location. What do you think?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: That looks pretty good! I'd love to take them there sometime.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: How about going there the next trip? The autumn colors are so beautiful!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Sounds great! The autumn colors would look awesome for pictures.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, photos are gonna turn out great with the dogs!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Can't wait to capture some amazing moments with our furry friends!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: It definitely will be a memorable day!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yep, can't wait to make some awesome memories with our furry friends!

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a man and his dog on a trail
conversation_turns.text: You bet! Can't wait to see their happy face! This was my dog and I when we were hiking last time, see how happy he was?

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Aww look at his happy face! I'm really looking forward to it! Can't wait to see my pups being happy and hiking.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Same here. Let's make it an epic and fun hike!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yep! It's gonna be so much fun.

conversation_turns.speaker: Andrew
conversation_turns.text: Let me get ready, gonna head out soon. Ttyl!

conversation_turns.speaker: Audrey
conversation_turns.text: Yep ttyl!

Andrew and Audrey plan to take their pets to a dog-friendly trail by the lake at a nearby national park.

Audrey is devoted to keeping her dogs healthy and happy.
